title: The death of civic nationalism
author: VD
content_html: I was interviewed by Brittany Pettibone and Tara McCarthy for their Virtue of the West show, where we discussed civic nationalism, among other things. It’s encouraging to see the younger generation is figuring this stuff out so much faster than we GenXers did.
content_text:
I was interviewed by Brittany Pettibone and Tara McCarthy for their
Virtue of the West
show, where we discussed civic nationalism, among other things. It’s encouraging to see the younger generation is figuring this stuff out so much faster than we GenXers did.
